stepAnswer: Yes using this syntax: ORDER BY Column1, Column2
stepBody: Can you use the ORDER BY clause with multiple columns, and if so, what is the correct syntax?
choices: No ordering by multiple columns is not supported.
No you can only order by one column at a time.
Yes but only if the columns are of the same data type.
Yes using this syntax: ORDER BY Column1 , Column2
Yes using this syntax: ORDER BY Column1, Column2
